org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.matrix

Class SparseBlockDistributedMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.matrix.AbstractMatrix
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.matrix.SparseBlockDistributedMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Destroyable, Matrix, MetaAttributes, StorageConstants, StorageOpsMetrics

    public class SparseBlockDistributedMatrix
extends AbstractMatrix
implements StorageConstants
    Sparse block distributed matrix. This matrix represented by blocks 32x32 MatrixBlockEntry. Using separate cache with keys MatrixBlockKey and values MatrixBlockEntry.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
